#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

long long gcd(long long a,long long b){
    return b>0 ? gcd(b,a%b) : a;
}

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    long long a,b;
	    cin>>a>>b;
	    if(b==1){
	        cout<<"Yes\n";
	        continue;
	    }
	    long long g=gcd(a,b);
	    //cout<<g<<"\n";
	    b = b/g;
	    if(b == 1){
	        cout<<"Yes\n";
	    }else if(g == 1 && b > 1){
	        cout<<"No\n";
	        continue;
	    }
	    while(b != 1){
	        if(g == 1 && b > 1){
	            cout<<"No\n";
	            break;
	        }
	        g = gcd(g, b);
	        b = b/g;
	        if(b == 1){
	            cout<<"Yes\n";
	            break;
	        }
	    }
    }
	return 0;
}
